text:
="preserve">Hassan Abshir Farah (,; June 20, 1945 – July 12, 2020) was a Somali politician. He was mayor of Mogadishu and interior minister of Puntland. From November 12, 2001 to December 8, 2003, he was also prime minister of Somalia. Farah was an MP in the Federal Parliament of Somalia from 2012 until his death.
Farah died in Turkey on July 12, 2020 at the age of 75.
